ing: 3 small frozen bananas (peel before you freeze)
des: "Even if you don't think you have time for breakfast, my Chocolate-Cherry-Banana Smoothie can be blended in just a few minutes. Pour it into a travel mug and enjoy it as you commute."
ins: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend on puree (or the highest setting) until smooth, about 30 seconds. Pour into glasses and serve.
